ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p:
At Apple, we work every day to create products that enrich people’s lives. Our Advertising Platforms group makes it possible for people around the world to easily access informative and imaginative content on their devices while helping publishers and developers promote and monetize their work.
Our technology and services power advertising in Apple News and Search Ads in App Store. Our platforms are highly-performant, deployed at scale, and setting new standards for enabling effective advertising while protecting user privacy.
We are seeking a rockstar DevOps engineer for the Big Data environments at Ad Platforms.

ul.li: 5+ years of working experience in Big Data technologies
Experience with Distributed Computing and Architecture
Development experience in object oriented programming languages such as Java /Scala is preferred
Big Data operations and support experience in Kafka and Solr is a must
Hands-on experience with DevOps tools, automating engineering and operational tasks
Highly knowledgeable and experienced with scripting languages like Puppet/Ansible and Python
Experience with source control management such as Git and/or SVN
Expertise in troubleshooting complex OS, database, file system, network configuration, and application & web servers
Strong verbal and written communication skills

div.p: As a senior DevOps engineer for our Big Data environment you’ll make a big impact in the strategic direction we take with our infrastructure. You’ll work on collaborative projects like building large scale data pipelines and analytical solutions between our team and others at Apple. Our team is small, but we have big ambitions. We need you to be a self-starter, a great communicator, and a solid technical contributor.
Technical BS/MS degree, Computer Science or Engineering preferred
